## About Signal Desktop

Signal Desktop represents the gold standard for secure private messaging, offering state-of-the-art encryption and privacy-focused communication across both macOS and Windows platforms. This trusted messaging application provides seamless synchronization with mobile devices while maintaining the same rigorous security standards that have made Signal the preferred choice for privacy-conscious individuals, journalists, activists, and security professionals worldwide. The clean, intuitive interface combined with uncompromising security protocols makes Signal Desktop the ideal solution for anyone seeking private communication without sacrificing usability or features.

The application's sophisticated security architecture includes forward secrecy that ensures past communications remain secure even if keys are compromised, sealed sender functionality that protects metadata by hiding sender information, and disappearing messages that automatically delete after set time periods. Whether you're coordinating with team members, communicating with family and friends, conducting sensitive business discussions, or simply valuing your digital privacy, Signal Desktop delivers reliable performance with the assurance that your conversations remain strictly private. The cross-platform compatibility ensures consistent secure messaging experiences whether you're using macOS workstations or Windows computers, while the open-source nature of the software allows independent verification of its security claims by experts worldwide.

## âš™ï¸ System Requirements

**For macOS Systems:**
- macOS Monterey 12.0 or later
- 2GB RAM minimum (4GB recommended for optimal performance)
- 200MB available storage space for application and message database
- Compatible with Intel and Apple Silicon processors
- Active Signal mobile app for initial desktop linking

**For Windows Platforms:**
- Windows 10 or later (64-bit architecture recommended)
- 2GB RAM (4GB recommended for group chats and media sharing)
- 200MB available storage space
- .NET Framework 4.8 or later
- Linked Signal mobile device for account verification
